member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_PROPERTY
member.summary: Contains pointer-based device properties (Human Interface Device (HID) global items that correspond to HID usages).

member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_PROPERTY.logicalMin
member.summary: The minimum value that the device can report for this property.

member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_PROPERTY.logicalMax
member.summary: The maximum value that the device can report for this property.

member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_PROPERTY.usagePageId
member.summary: The usage page for the property, as documented in the HID specification.

member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_PROPERTY.usageId
member.summary: The usage of the property, as documented in the HID specification.
